title: Adani Green Energy, Adani Energy Solutions join UNEZA
description: Adani Green Energy and Adani Energy Solutions have joined the Utilities for Net Zero Alliance, established at COP28. This alliance unites global utilities to promote renewable energy and electrification. AGEL will focus on clean power and energy efficiency, while AESL aims to develop reliable grid infrastructure. Both companies target net zero emissions by 2050.
